title: Written in the Stars
description: Jill has always relied on a bit of help from her horoscope in order to make decisions; but at 29, still single and in an unfulfilling career, she is starting to wonder if the stars have led her astray. After a psychic swears that passion lies in Brazil, Jill buys a bikini and books a plane ticket. What the psychic didn't foresee; however, was meeting sexy Andrew before even leaving the ground...
author: Michelle Tangedal
